roleset.name: the act of putting something somewhere

roles.note: Watch out for instances that reference the physical deposit (e.g. ore, money, or anything that is actually arg1) rather than the act of depositing.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He contends that his deposit of funds into the trust account did not constitute commingling.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry deposit.01; corresponds to VN class put-9.1-1.

example.name: NONE OF THESE ARE EVENTIVE. Call it .YY!
example.text: Most of the world s recoverable deposits lie in south America lake deposits and in our own western North Carolina in vast quartz deposits .
example.note: Every instance of 'deposit' in this sentence references a physical entity (either a hunk of ore, or a location). None is an event.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE! .YY!
example.text: Hi My husband and I are looking to buy the hosue we currently live in , but we do not have a deposit .
example.note: Here, we could replace "a deposit" with "the money". This is not an event.
